title: Design and Operation of an Internal Quality Assurance System (IQAS) for Strengthening Higher Education Quality Management

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A course for instructors and educational operators in vocational training institutions in the language education field who operate online real-time classes. Project-based assessment in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: One can apply the IQAS 7-stage model (standard setting, implementation, monitoring, self-evaluation, internal audit, improvement planning, quality enhancement) to language education curricula
One can design a quality indicator system for online synchronous classes and develop data collection tools
One can analyze project-based assessment results to create and implement educational improvement plans

resources: Real-Time Video Lecture Platform (Zoom/Google Meet, etc.)
Educational Quality Management Templates (Standard Setting Guide, Monitoring Checklist, etc.)
Project Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Notion, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
